TopicTitle: So I was testing a new ship...

Articles.Content: This ship to be exact. The fuel tanks were made with Parts Generator by Lando http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/48368-Part-Generator-Version-3-Win-Linux-Mac So I wanted to try the Lazer mod and selected the teleport option and selected one of my Kerbals. Nice special effect and suddenly my poor kerbal is speeding around Kerbin at incredible speed. And he made good time to Kerbin escape. He wasn't none too happy about it either. LOL! I must have done something wrong (ya think?) A short time later, KSP crashed.
O yea kerbals have been known to hit a percentage of the speed if light. It was a bug in the Lazor mod or more likely a conflict with those generated parts that I'm just now hearing of. Interesting..
I am assuming you didn't set a position with a lazor to teleport him to? You need to direct the white laser at the teleport position BEFORE hitting teleport

I had targeted the ship I was wanting him to teleport to, but that is probably different from what you just said to do. While I was watching this poor fella, the other two ship in orbit must have collided and exploded.
